page.title: 10 Sport
page.content: Almost everybody in the whole of Britain in 1985 has a sport of some sort.Old and young and both sexes.If you turn on the televison on a Saturday all you find is sport, sport, sport.Its the same with the Radio, and the magazines and the papers are full of it.The most popular sports are Tennis,Squash,Rugby,Football,Cricket, and all the track and field events. The less popular events are Croquet, Curling, Polo, and Hockey.People do sports for a couple of reasons.The first is for their health, but some do it to compete.Football,Rugby,Hockey, Netball, Tennis,Volleyball,Swimming, Cricket,Running,Highjump,Longjump, Javalin,Hurdles, Shotputt,Basketball, Squash,Snooker,Hammer,Discus,Polevault Triple jump,Relay,Badminton,Icehockey, BMX,Fishing,Polo,Judo,Sking,Golf,Karat e,Boxing,Basketball,Diving and so on.
